name: Crunches
how_to_perform:
1. Lie on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground, hip-width apart.
2. Place your hands behind your head, interlacing your fingers to support your neck without pulling on your head.
3. Engage your core by drawing in your belly button towards your spine.
4. Slowly lift your shoulders off the ground, curling up your torso as you exhale.
5. Pause briefly at the top of the movement with your back straight and knees bent at an angle.
6. Lower your shoulders back down to the starting position without allowing your lower back to arch or sag.
7. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
short_summary: Crunches are a bodyweight exercise that primarily targets the core muscles, specifically the abs.
